name: Iglacia
description:
Survive for 15 minutes or last as long as you can in this drawing-based time survival roguelite. Try to reach the highest difficulty you can, complete events, get new gear, and face off against Frojsa the Ice Dragon by figuring out a way into his den.

Some Features:

  • Drawing, shooting, dodging
  • ~30 unique upgrades to use
  • Shops to upgrade your arsenal
  • Modifiers to freshen up your runs
  • Up to 50 difficulties to beat

Join the Discord server!

https://discord.gg/VdAnYNEfCA
Let me know what you think, what you'd like to see in future updates, if you've encountered a bug, or if you just want to hang out.
